MultiplicaitonButton_Click
private void MultiplicaitonButton_Click(
object sender,
EventArgs e
)

If there is not an already queued operation, puts the number in the Display into the OperandText label and operand float, sets nextOp to "mult".

Otherwise, it evaluates the currently queued operation and then exicutes the above

DivisionButton_Click
private void DivisionButton_Click(
object sender,
EventArgs e
)

If there is not an already queued operation, puts the number in the Display into the OperandText label and operand float, sets nextOp to "div".

Otherwise, it evaluates the currently queued operation and then exicutes the above.

SubtractionButton_Click
private void SubtractionButton_Click(
object sender,
EventArgs e
)

If there is not an already queued operation, puts the number in the Display into the OperandText label and operand float, sets nextOp to "sub".

Otherwise, it evaluates the currently queued operation and then exicutes the above.

AdditionButton_Click
private void AdditionButton_Click(
object sender,
EventArgs e
)

If there is not an already queued operation, puts the number in the Display into the OperandText label and operand float, sets nextOp to "div".

Otherwise, it evaluates the currently queued operation and then exicutes the above.

object sender,

)

Calls the evaluate function

evaluate
private void evaluate()

Evaluates the current contents of the calculator based on the contents of operand the Display and nextOp.

disableAll
private void disableAll()

Disables all the buttons except for the ClearButton

enableAll
private void enableAll()

Enables all of the buttons.
